description: Adversaries may shutdown/reboot systems to interrupt access to, or aid in the destruction of, those systems. Author: Igor Fits, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: System Shutdown/Reboot
query: (type:"EXECVE" AND ((*shutdown* OR *reboot* OR *halt* OR *poweroff*) OR ((*init* OR *telinit*) AND (*0* OR *6*))))
